inputs.name: package-version-ids
inputs.description: Comma separated string of package version ids to delete.

inputs.name: owner
inputs.description: Owner of the repo containing the package version to delete. Defaults to the owner of the repo running the action.

inputs.name: package-name
inputs.description: Name of the package containing the version to delete.

inputs.name: package-type
inputs.description: Type of package. Can be one of container, maven, npm, nuget, or rubygems.

inputs.name: num-old-versions-to-delete
inputs.description: Number of versions to delete starting with the oldest version. Defaults to 1.

inputs.name: min-versions-to-keep
inputs.description: Number of versions to keep starting with the latest version By default keeps no version. To delete all versions set this as 0.

inputs.name: ignore-versions
inputs.description: Regex pattern for package versions to ignore. Defaults to delete all versions.

inputs.name: delete-only-pre-release-versions
inputs.description: Deletes only pre-release versions. The number of pre-release versions to keep can be specified by min-versions-to-keep. When this is set num-old-versions-to-delete and ignore-versions will not be taken into account. By default this is set to false

inputs.name: delete-only-untagged-versions
inputs.description: Deletes only untagged versions in case of a container package. Does not work for other package types. The number of untagged versions to keep can be specified by min-versions-to-keep. When this is set num-old-versions-to-delete will not be taken into account. By default this is set to false

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Token with the necessary scopes to delete package versions. If num-old-versions-to-delete is used the token also needs the read packages scope. Defaults to github.token scoped to the repo running the action. To delete package versions of a package outside the repo the action is running in use a Personal Access Token stored as a secret.
